column2: Anita Blake: Circus of the Damned The Ingenue (2010) #2
column6: Things go from bad to worse for Anita Blake when a visit to the morgue turns into a bloodbath! Best-selling author Laurell K. Hamilton's beloved heroine turns up the heat in this count-the-corpses chapter that will leaves fans begging for more!
column8: | editor:Charlie Beckerman | penciller (cover):Brett Booth | writer:Laurell K. Hamilton | writer:Jess Ruffnerbooth | penciller:Ron Lim
